changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.context_attribute AS SELECT ca.id, c.name AS context, ca.sequence_number, a.name AS attribute, ca.required, r.name AS updated_by, ca.update_date FROM ruleform.context_attribute ca JOIN ruleform.location_context c ON ca.context = c.id JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON ca.attribute = a.id JOIN ruleform.resource r ON ca.updated_by = r.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.context_attribute OWNER TO core;
